revision.text:
{{wiktionary}} '''Consumption''' may refer to:
*[[Resource consumption]] ==Biology== * [[Consumption (ecology)]], receipt of energy by consuming other organisms * The disease [[tuberculosis]], historically
==Social sciences== * [[Consumption (economics)]], the purchasing of newly produced goods for current use ** [[Consumption function]], an economic formula * [[Consumption (sociology)]] of resources, associated with social class, identity, group membership, and age
==See also== * {{Intitle|consumption}} * [[Consumerism]]
{{disambiguation}}
